title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 52.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 52.1 - Introduction

State Regulations

Subdivision 18-a of section
375
of
the Vehicle and Traffic Law requires that every motor vehicle registered in
this State and manufactured or assembled after June 30, 1965, and designated as
a 1966 or subsequent year model, shall be equipped with a vehicular traffic
hazard warning device approved by the commissioner. For the purposes of this

Part, such a device shall be a separate, driver controlled unit which causes
the front and rear directional signals to flash simultaneously as a vehicular
traffic hazard warning. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
52.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
